title: AC-130 Corki skin
body: Come one Riot we know all those 12ives love COD thats why we need a AC-130 CORKI SKIN {{champion:42}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:42}} {{item:3902}} {{item:3902}} {{item:3902}} {{item:3902}} {{item:3902}}

replies.body: I thought we should have had a spitfire corki skin for the 75th anniversary of the battle of Brittan on sunday.
There is a red baron right. ?
We should just have a firefighter corki.
